message.content:
cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.SY

The paper deals with the security of Internet of Battlefield Things (IoBT) systems, which is a subfield of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed mechanism involves a dynamic psychological game between a soldier and an attacker, which falls under game theory (cs.GT). The IoBT network is a type of wireless network, which is a subfield of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The learning algorithm proposed in the paper is based on Bayesian updating, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper deals with the optimization of a time-critical mission, which involves control systems (cs.SY).
